hero.title: Transform Your Vision Into
hero.description: I create stunning, responsive websites that help your business grow. From concept to launch, I'll bring your digital dreams to life.

heroV2.title: I create websites for your business
heroV2.description: Clean, functional web design and development. I help businesses establish their online presence.

services.title: What Can I Build For You?
services.description: Every project is custom-built to match your specific needs. Here's what I specialize in:

cta.sectionDescription: Tell me about your vision and I'll provide a custom quote within 24 hours.

items.title: E-Commerce Store
items.description: Complete online stores with secure payments, inventory management, and seamless checkout experiences.

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: Stunning showcases for your work with elegant galleries, smooth animations, and personal branding.

items.title: Landing Page
items.description: High-converting single pages designed to capture leads, launch products, or promote campaigns.

items.title: Web Application
items.description: Custom interactive applications with user authentication, dashboards, and dynamic functionality.
items.idealFor: SaaS products, internal tools, custom platforms

items.title: E-Commerce
items.description: Online stores with payments and inventory.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.description: A showcase of recent work demonstrating my expertise in web development

projects.title: Modern Portfolio Website
projects.description: A sleek portfolio site for a creative professional with smooth animations and responsive design.

projects.title: E-Commerce Store
projects.description: Full-featured online store with product management, cart functionality, and secure checkout.

projects.title: Mobile App Landing Page
projects.description: Eye-catching landing page for a mobile app with download tracking and analytics.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a passionate freelance web developer with over 5 years of experience creating beautiful, functional websites for clients worldwide.
My approach combines technical expertise with creative design thinking to deliver websites that not only look great but also drive real business results.
Whether you're a startup looking for your first website or an established business wanting to upgrade your online presence, I'm here to help you succeed.
about.quote: Success is not about the tools you use, but how you use them to solve real problems for real people.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Ready to start your project? Get in touch and let's create something amazing

getInTouch.title: Get In Touch
getInTouch.description: Fill out the form and I'll get back to you within 24 hours. Or reach out directly using the contact information below.

name.max: Name must be less than 50 characters
